description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nSandstorm:
This creature always has {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIND}. When your creatures with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIND} {ACTION_cast} a spell that targets more than one creature, it instead targets all creatures and has 100% more potency. This trait does not stack.
name: Bottled Wind
